metadata.synopsis: Bugbear vendor yells at the player when entering combat. If at least one of the players had impressed him, he wil look forward to the challange of fighting them. If they failed to impresse him, he will taunt them. If not of the players attempted to impress him, he will be existed for the bloodshed regardless.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Impress/fail to impress bugbearvendor in moonrise towers bazaarenter combat with himwait till it's his turn

0.speaker: Lann Tarv
0.context: NodeContext: Entering combat with relish - he was extremely bored

1.speaker: Lann Tarv
1.text: Time to put your tales to the test, warrior!
1.context: NodeContext: Excited anticipation, not entirely unfriendly - yes he's about to kill us, but we told him enough stories of our exploits that he's excited by the challenge

2.speaker: Lann Tarv
2.text: I hope you do battle better than you boast, pup.
2.context: NodeContext: A little bored - fighting us might be a chore. (We told him tales of our exploits before, but he was unimpressed)
